attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under current legislation, patients undergoing renal dialysis treatment are often not classed as disabled therefore do not get access to the correct types of funding available in the form of benefits, nor are they considered automatically eligible for disabled parking rights. Also, we are not classed as eligible for free prescriptions, as the majority are on drugs for life to maintain health and I feel this needs to be changed also.
